analysis.description:
AnythingAppTokenPreSale.doPurchase (/unique_contracts/0x5e579642e6b18990672a98e4017390839efd2659.sol#590-630) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- token.balanceOf(msg.sender) == 0

Reentrancy in AnythingAppTokenPreSale.doPurchase (/unique_contracts/0x5e579642e6b18990672a98e4017390839efd2659.sol#590-630):
	External calls:
	- token.balanceOf(msg.sender) == 0 (/unique_contracts/0x5e579642e6b18990672a98e4017390839efd2659.sol#591-593)
	- referral = investorWhiteList.getReferralOf(msg.sender) (/unique_contracts/0x5e579642e6b18990672a98e4017390839efd2659.sol#596-598)
	- require(bool)(token.balanceOf(msg.sender).add(tokens) <= LIMIT_PER_USER) (/unique_contracts/0x5e579642e6b18990672a98e4017390839efd2659.sol#610-612)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokensSold (/unique_contracts/0x5e579642e6b18990672a98e4017390839efd2659.sol#612)

AnythingAppTokenPreSale.doPurchase (/unique_contracts/0x5e579642e6b18990672a98e4017390839efd2659.sol#590-630) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(msg.sender,tokens) (/unique_contracts/0x5e579642e6b18990672a98e4017390839efd2659.sol#618-622)
	-token.transfer(referral,referralBonus) (/unique_contracts/0x5e579642e6b18990672a98e4017390839efd2659.sol#625-626)

AnythingAppTokenPreSale.withdraw (/unique_contracts/0x5e579642e6b18990672a98e4017390839efd2659.sol#647-669) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(beneficiary,token.balanceOf(this)) (/unique_contracts/0x5e579642e6b18990672a98e4017390839efd2659.sol#664-666)

AnythingAppTokenPreSale.refund.refund (local variable @ /unique_contracts/0x5e579642e6b18990672a98e4017390839efd2659.sol#671-672) shadows:
	- AnythingAppTokenPreSale.refund (function @ /unique_contracts/0x5e579642e6b18990672a98e4017390839efd2659.sol#669-673)

Reentrancy in AnythingAppTokenPreSale.doPurchase (/unique_contracts/0x5e579642e6b18990672a98e4017390839efd2659.sol#590-630):
	External calls:
	- token.balanceOf(msg.sender) == 0 (/unique_contracts/0x5e579642e6b18990672a98e4017390839efd2659.sol#591-593)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- investorCount (/unique_contracts/0x5e579642e6b18990672a98e4017390839efd2659.sol#593)

Reentrancy in AnythingAppTokenPreSale.doPurchase (/unique_contracts/0x5e579642e6b18990672a98e4017390839efd2659.sol#590-630):
	External calls:
	- token.balanceOf(msg.sender) == 0 (/unique_contracts/0x5e579642e6b18990672a98e4017390839efd2659.sol#591-593)
	- referral = investorWhiteList.getReferralOf(msg.sender) (/unique_contracts/0x5e579642e6b18990672a98e4017390839efd2659.sol#596-598)
	- require(bool)(token.balanceOf(msg.sender).add(tokens) <= LIMIT_PER_USER) (/unique_contracts/0x5e579642e6b18990672a98e4017390839efd2659.sol#610-612)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- collected (/unique_contracts/0x5e579642e6b18990672a98e4017390839efd2659.sol#612-613)
	- deposited (/unique_contracts/0x5e579642e6b18990672a98e4017390839efd2659.sol#613-618)

Reentrancy in AnythingAppTokenPreSale.withdraw (/unique_contracts/0x5e579642e6b18990672a98e4017390839efd2659.sol#647-669):
	External calls:
	- token.transfer(beneficiary,token.balanceOf(this)) (/unique_contracts/0x5e579642e6b18990672a98e4017390839efd2659.sol#664-666)
	External calls sending eth:
	- beneficiary.transfer(collected) (/unique_contracts/0x5e579642e6b18990672a98e4017390839efd2659.sol#664)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- crowdsaleFinished (/unique_contracts/0x5e579642e6b18990672a98e4017390839efd2659.sol#666-669)

AnythingAppTokenPreSale.withdraw (/unique_contracts/0x5e579642e6b18990672a98e4017390839efd2659.sol#647-669) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp >= endTime) (/unique_contracts/0x5e579642e6b18990672a98e4017390839efd2659.sol#661-664)

AnythingAppToken.transfer uses assembly (/unique_contracts/0x5e579642e6b18990672a98e4017390839efd2659.sol#411-436)
	- /unique_contracts/0x5e579642e6b18990672a98e4017390839efd2659.sol#417-421
